welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Little Ferry, the charming city known for its picturesque waterfront and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Teterboro Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as the primary hub for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Used for domestic flights by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: One of the largest terminals, used by multiple airlines for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Exclusively used by JetBlue for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Operated by British Airways and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
